name: California
title: House Passes Bill to Cut Federal Funding for Planned Parenthood
description: The U.S. House of Representatives narrowly passed a bill this week to strip federal funding from Planned Parenthood, the country's largest abortion provider. The measure, which has received specific praise from pro-life advocacy groups and religious organizations, now awaits approval from the Senate and President Donald Trump.
